jobDescription: Title:Data ModelerLocation:Branch burg, NJDuration:6 to 12 MonthsRoles & Responsibilities:Understand and review various source specification documentsDefine data derivation and mapping rules for extracting data from various data sourcesReview data dictionary - as required, work with Data Steward (s) / business for clarification and alignment on the sameDefine / review conceptual and logical data modelsDefine normalized / de-normalized data model supporting:Multi country/sector business datamultiple data entitiesfuture reporting requirementsWork closely with IT and Business team to understand information requirements and business rulesConduct data analysis as per project requirementsGuide sprint (implementation) team on overall data architectureMust have Skills:Minimum 5 years of experience in data modeling in complex business transformation projectsMinimum 8 years of total IT experienceExperience in using ERWIN for data modellingHands on with PL/SQLprovided by Dice Erwin, PL/SQL
